name: Gothic II: Gold Edition
notes:
Change game resolution in drive_c/GOG Games/Gothic 2 Gold/system/gothic.ini

For example:

zVidResFullscreenX=1920
zVidResFullscreenY=1080
zVidResFullscreenBPP=32

files.setup: N/A:Select the GOG game setup file

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the GOG game setup file
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Gothic 2 Gold/system/Gothic2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directmusic
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    description: Setting Wine to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Gothic 2
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Gothic 2 Gold/system/gothic.ini
    key: zVidResFullscreenX
    section: VIDEO
    value: 1920
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Gothic 2 Gold/system/gothic.ini
    key: zVidResFullscreenY
    section: VIDEO
    value: 1080
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Gothic 2 Gold/system/gothic.ini
    key: zVidResFullscreenBPP
    section: VIDEO
    value: 32
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Gothic 2 Gold/system/gothic.ini
    key: subTitles
    section: GAME
    value: 1
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Gothic 2 Gold/system/gothic.ini
    key: scaleVideos
    section: GAME
    value: 1
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Gothic 2 Gold/system/gothic.ini
    key: bloodDetail
    section: GAME
    value: 3
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Gothic 2 Gold/system/gothic.ini
    key: modelDetail
    section: PERFORMANCE
    value: 1
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Gothic 2 Gold/system/gothic.ini
    key: sightValue
    section: PERFORMANCE
    value: 14
wine:
  overrides:
    dsound: b
